description: Claude Code skill that auto-generates video demos of web app changes using Playwright

userStories.title: Create basic skill file structure
userStories.description: Set up the Claude Code skill that can be invoked with /record-demo
acceptanceCriteria: Create skill file at ~/.claude/commands/record-demo.md
Skill is discoverable via /record-demo command
Skill contains placeholder prompt structure
userStories.notes: Check Claude Code docs for skill file format

userStories.title: Detect web app and changed files
userStories.description: Skill prompts Claude to analyze git diff and identify what changed
acceptanceCriteria: Prompt instructs Claude to run git diff
Detect if project is web app (package.json with react/vue/next/vite)
Extract list of changed component/page files
Identify likely affected routes from file paths

userStories.title: Start dev server and wait for ready
userStories.description: Skill prompts Claude to start the dev server before recording
acceptanceCriteria: Detect start script from package.json (dev, start, etc.)
Start server in background
Wait for server to be ready (poll localhost)
Handle common ports (3000, 5173, 8080)
userStories.notes: Use Bash tool for server, need to handle cleanup

userStories.title: Navigate and record with Playwright
userStories.description: Use Playwright MCP to browse the app and record video
acceptanceCriteria: Prompt instructs Claude to use browser_navigate to open app
Visit routes affected by changes
Take screenshots or record interactions
Save output to demos/ folder with timestamp
userStories.notes: Relies on user having Playwright MCP configured

userStories.title: AI-driven interaction based on diff
userStories.description: Claude analyzes the diff and decides what to click/test
acceptanceCriteria: Prompt tells Claude to read the actual code changes
Identify interactive elements (buttons, forms, etc.) that changed
Generate interaction plan
Execute interactions via Playwright MCP
userStories.notes: This is the smart part - Claude reads diff and decides actions

userStories.title: Generate summary with video/screenshots
userStories.description: Output a summary of what was tested with media
acceptanceCriteria: Create demos/[timestamp]/ folder
Save screenshots of each step
Generate summary.md with what was tested
Print path to user when done
userStories.notes: User can attach this to PR
